servinfo.title: Gear Shift Lever Front Case Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Dismount transmission assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Petrol Engine Model .
Remove gear shift lever front case assembly (1) from transmission rear case.

item.ptxt: Install gear shift lever front case to transmission rear case without using sealant for functional check.
Install shift control lever and check to make sure that it shifts smoothly according to shift pattern as shown in figure.

s1.ptxt: Clean mating surface of both rear case and gear shift lever front case (2), and uniformly apply sealant to lever case as shown in figure by such amount that its section is 1.2 mm (0.047 in.) in diameter, and then mate it with gear shift lever front case.
Install lever case to rear case and then tighten new lever case bolts (1) to specified torque.

torqueitem.t-part: Gear shift lever front case bolt

s1.ptxt: Connect gear shift shaft (3) of lever case assembly to gear shift control joint (4) of gear shift control arm assembly referring to figure for proper installing direction of control shaft joint bolt (5). Tighten control shaft joint bolt (5) and control arm bolts (6) to specified torque.
Remount transmission assembly referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Petrol Engine Model .
